title: Summoner icon for PvP pentakill (proposal)
body:
Hey guys.. I was just thinking.. How about some more summoner icons for in-game achievements?
Most icons we have now are obtained through buying them with RP or unlocking them in during holiday events.
It would be cool if a player could get a new icon for, say, getting a penta-kill in PvP, or soloing Bazza... Things like that...

...Thoughts?

replies.body: I feel like i'd prefer to see rewards for like 100/1000/10000 assists, and maybe even a small IP reward with it, 100 assists-25 IP then 1000 assists -100 IP, nothing huge, just another small incentive to the game that we all play regardless, except now you'd just have a few small bonuses, the thing is, the icons have to be things EVERYBODY can achieve, but that aren't super easy, i'm not sure on what rewards would be suitable, riot could sort something if they were so inclined, a free 250rp skin for 10000 assists or w/e

I had this same idea a while back about the pentakill icon, i don't see a problem with it, sure its harder to get it playing as supp but you shouldn't be playing only supp all the time anyway, although the solo baron one i disagree with because that does exclude teamwork.

i like the idea, but it wouldn't work, teamwork is already hard enough let alone people wanting to solo baron, get penta etc. That is why teambuilder gives icons to promote those roles

like it but would never work (unless in bots, doom bots perhaps)
There's a reason why playing a certain role in Team Builder gives certain icons.

Yeah let's discourage people from playing tanks and other supporting roles more.

Or do you want icons to be the next xbox achievements, like literally everything you do has an achievement attached to it?

Imo, just no.

I wasn't suggesting there be only the ones I mentioned, or loads of easy ones...
I'm suggesting icons to show that you've actually accomplished something.. other than spending $ on RP for it...
There could be an Icon for getting a certain amount of assists in a game? I'm just spit-balling here. I just feel like there's very little reward for people who don't have the real life money to spend on RP. And I think goal-orientated summoner icons would be a nice feature.

That's why I commented like that.

You either have it promotes certain roles, champ or whatever and leaving others out by going with the penta/solo baron kind of direction.

Or go for "for everyone" style and soon become the next xbox achievements where everything you do can earn an achievement of some sort.

Which both of them ain't good imo.

If you want more icons for customisation purposes without spending RPs however, I say instead of going the action oriented achievements do something like Champ, spell, item icons would be a good thing. Like playing a champ X times to earn the champ or his/her spell icons or something.

So you can proudly show off "Hey I'm XXX maine!!" to your peers, and solve the issue of customisation. Sorta.
